T04D3904:293b-1: ta rka bi h'a na ta ti pi ta ka bri ttin'a ma /
T04D3904:293b-3: tshad ma rnam par 'joms pa mdor bshad pa'i 'grel pa zhes bya ba /
T04D3904:293b-4: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T04D3904:293b-5: chu bo lta bu las brgal zhing //
T04D3904:293b-6: shin tu phra ba'ang rnam par spangs //
T04D3904:293b-7: nam mkha' lta bur rab gsal ba //
T04D3904:293b-9: mkhas pa dga' ba bskyed pa'i phyir //
T04D3904:293b-10: rnam par 'joms pa'i don bshad bya //
T04D3904:293b-11: de la slob dpon chen po klu sgrub kyi zhes
T04D3904:293b-12: bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig dang po 'di sa
T04D3904:293b-13: ni bdag nyid kyis rang bzo ma yin zhing /
T04D3904:293b-14: dgos pa dang 'brel pa la sogs pa bstan pa yin te /
T04D3904:293b-15: gang zhig dgos pa la sogs pa ma brjod na
T04D3904:293b-16: rtog pa dang ldan pa rnams 'jug par mi 'gyur
T04D3904:293b-17: te / de'i phyir na gdon mi za bar brjod dgos pa yin no //
T04D3904:293b-18: rtog pa dang ldan pa rnams ji ltar mi 'jug ce na /
T04D3904:293b-19: de la rtog pa sngon du gtong ba rnams ni
T04D3904:293b-20: ma brjod na med pa'i cha la gnas pa'i the
T04D3904:293b-21: tshom skye la / 'dir the tshom dang ldan pa ni 'jug par 'gyur ba kho na'o //
T04D3904:293b-22: gzhan yang brjod par bya ba ma brjod na /
T04D3904:293b-23: bstan bcos la bsnyon pa'i tshig lta bur dgos pa'i 'du shes 'byung la /
T04D3904:293b-24: de bzhin du dgos pa ma brjod na khva'i so
T04D3904:293b-25: brtag pa'i bstan bcos bzhin du 'jug par mi 'gyur
T04D3904:293b-26: ro // 'brel pa med pa ji lta bu zhe na /
T04D3904:293b-27: klu sbyin byed la rin po che yod pa bzhin te /
T04D3904:293b-28: 'dir ni 'brel pa brjod dgos pa kho na'o //
T04D3904:293b-29: gzhan yang dgos pa'i dgos pa ma brjod na /
T04D3904:293b-30: phyi rol pa'i bstan bcos las gsang tshig bsgrub pa'i
T04D3904:293b-31: rkyen rang gi ma la me skor byed pa'i rim
T04D3904:293b-33: tha snyad du mi rung zhing blo 'byung ba de'i phyir brjod dgos pa kho na yin no //
T04D3904:293b-34: gal te de ltar yin mod kyi slob dpon chen
T04D3904:293b-35: po klu sgrub kyis tshad ma'i mtha' la zhen pa
T04D3904:293b-36: bsal ba'i phyir rigs pa'i tshogs du ma brjod pa
T04D3904:293b-39: mdor bsdus pas don rdzogs par 'dod pa rnams kyi
T04D3904:293b-40: dbang du byas nas bkol zhing bkod pa yin no
T04D3904:293b-41: // 'o na dgos pa la sogs pa ji ltar bstan zhe na /
T04D3904:293b-42: dngos dang shags kyis bstan pa yin te /
T04D3904:293b-43: de la 'dir rab tu byed pa bstan pas dor
T04D3904:293b-44: bar bya ba dang blang bar bya ba shes pa
T04D3904:294a-1: ba'i tha snyad la rab tu 'jug cing grub pa ni dgos pa'i yang dgos pa'o //
T04D3904:294a-2: de la shugs kyis bstan pa ni 'brel pa ste /
T04D3904:294a-3: de yang mdor bsdus shing bkol ba'i rab tu byed pa ni thabs yin la /
T04D3904:294a-4: dgos pa ni de las byung ba ni /
T04D3904:294a-5: 'dir yang thabs dang thabs las byung ba dang /
T04D3904:294a-6: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i tshul gyis 'brel pa yin no //
T04D3904:294a-7: 'o na rab tu byed pas sbyor bar bya ba gang brjod ce na /
T04D3904:294a-8: des na bsal ba dang bsgrub pa'i don brjod pas de ni brjod par bya ba'o //
T04D3904:294a-9: da ni tshig gi don bstan par bya ba'i phyir
T04D3904:294a-10: slob dpon zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa'o
T04D3904:294a-11: // de la chen po zhes bya ba ni rig
T04D3904:294a-12: pa dang ldan zhing kun kyang rjes su 'gro ba'i
T04D3904:294a-13: gnas dam pa yin pas na slob dpon chen po'o
T04D3904:294a-14: // // klu sgrub ni mi las khyad par du 'phags pa'i mtshan gyi che ba ste /
T04D3904:294a-15: de yang sngon gang zhig gi don du klu'i yul du byon pa la /
T04D3904:294a-16: klu rnams kyis so so'i rdzu 'phrul bstan pas zil gyis non par ma nus pas /
T04D3904:294a-17: klu'i rgyal po nye da dang gi bu mo byin
T04D3904:294a-18: nas klu rnams kyis mchod pa byed cing der mtshan
T04D3904:294a-19: thob nas mi'i yul du dge slong gi dus su
T04D3904:294a-20: yang grags so // zhal snga zhes pa ni bdag cag kun gyis sri zhu'i tshul gyis bod pa'o //
T04D3904:294a-21: tshad mas zhes bya ba ni phyin ci log gi
T04D3904:294a-22: rgyu mtshan ston te mi gnod cing grub la mi
T04D3904:294a-23: slu ba ste / de de'i mtshan nyid ma grub pas na rnam par 'joms pa'o //
T04D3904:294a-24: rab tu byed ces bya ba ni pra ka ra
T04D3904:294a-25: na'i sgra las mchog tu byed pa dang don ston
T04D3904:294a-27: nas zhes pa ni 'byung khungs kyi don du shes par bya'o //
T04D3904:294a-28: de la bsdus pa'i don ni 'di yin te /
T04D3904:294a-29: rnam par 'joms pa chen po la sogs par sel ba dang /
T04D3904:294a-30: bsgrub pa'i rigs pa'i tshogs du ma bstan pa te /
T04D3904:294a-31: de yang sel ba ni 'dir chad ma ma grub pa la sogs pas ston la /
T04D3904:294a-32: gzhan ni yi ge mangs kyis dogs pas ma bris so //
T04D3904:294a-33: de la bsgrub pa ni re zhig phyogs tsam zhig brjod par bya ste /
T04D3904:294a-34: de yang kho bo cag dbu ma chen po pa
T04D3904:294a-35: rnams kyis ni dgag par bya ba thams cad bkag
T04D3904:294a-36: pa la bsgrub pa zhes nye bar 'dogs so //
T04D3904:294a-37: dgag bya yang re zhig sems tsam dbu ma la
T04D3904:294a-38: sogs pa don dam par rdzas dang rdzas tsam du
T04D3904:294a-39: 'dod pa thams cad 'og nas 'byung ba'i rigs pa
T04D3904:294a-41: de la ltos pa'i kun rdzob dang rdzas su med
T04D3904:294b-0: pa @294b yang bsal zhing dgag par bya ba kho
T04D3904:294b-1: na'o // de la kun rdzob ni sam bri ta'i sgra ste /
T04D3904:294b-2: sgrib pa'am 'khrul pa la sogs pa'o //
T04D3904:294b-3: de'i phyir na de yang dgag par bya ba nyid do //
T04D3904:294b-4: sgyu ma rdzas su med pa de yang sa yin te /
T04D3904:294b-5: sems tsam dbu ma pa lta bu'o //
T04D3904:294b-6: de ltar slob dpon gyi dgongs pa ni /
T04D3904:294b-8: re zhig bsgrub pa'i tshul dang /
T04D3904:294b-9: mthar rnam par gcod pa 'ba' zhig la nan tan
T04D3904:294b-10: du byas nas yongs su gcod pa ni ci yang
T04D3904:294b-11: mi byed pa yin snyam du dgongs la /
T04D3904:294b-12: gzhan dag ni gzhan du yang 'chad do //
T04D3904:294b-13: de la ci'i phyir yongs su gcod pa mi byed ce na /
T04D3904:294b-14: klu sgrub zhabs kyis rigs pa'i tshogs du ma bkod pa las /
T04D3904:294b-15: gang yongs su gcod pa ci yang ma grub cing dgag par bya ba yin pa kho na'o //
T04D3904:294b-16: 'o na dgag bya zhes bya ba ji lta bu
T04D3904:294b-17: zhe na bden mod kyi 'on kyang blo'i rim pa
T04D3904:294b-19: de ltar skabs las byung ba'i don mdo tsam zhig bstan nas /
T04D3904:294b-20: da ni phyogs snga ma bsal ba'i tshig gi don la 'jug par bya ste /
T04D3904:294b-21: de la rtog pa rnam pa gnyis kyis nye bar brtags pa ni 'di rnams te /
T04D3904:294b-22: de'i phyir rtog ges zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
T04D3904:294b-23: 'di yin te zhes bya ba ni nye bar dgod pa'i tshig ste /
T04D3904:294b-24: tshig gi don bcu drug go //
T04D3904:294b-25: de dag kyang ji lta bu zhe na /
T04D3904:294b-26: tshad ma dang ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
T04D3904:294b-27: de la mtha' la zhes pa rnams ni tshad ma'i don rang nyid grub pa dang /
T04D3904:294b-28: gzhan gyis mi gnod pa zhes zer ro //
T04D3904:294b-29: gzhal bya ni des gzhal bar bya ba skyes bu'i
T04D3904:294b-30: don 'grub pa'i rgyu yang dag pa gcig yod ces
T04D3904:294b-31: zer la / gzhan yang the tshom ni don 'grub
T04D3904:294b-32: pa'i gegs byed pa yang dag pa gcig go zhes
T04D3904:294b-33: zer la / zer ro // dgos pa ni gang gi tha snyad du rung bar byas pa zhe'o //
T04D3904:294b-34: dpe zhes pa ni gtan tshigs kyi grogs khyab pa
T04D3904:294b-35: dang 'brel pa gtan la dbab pa'i gzhir 'dod la
T04D3904:294b-36: / grub pa'i mtha' yang tshad mas gzhal bya'i don
T04D3904:294b-37: grub par bya ba yang dag pa gcig go zhes
T04D3904:294b-38: / so // gzhan yang cha shas ni bsgrub bya
T04D3904:294b-39: grub par byed pa'i nus pa'i cha so sor 'dod
T04D3904:294b-40: / so // de / ji lta bu zhe na /
T04D3904:294b-41: chos can gyi nus pa dang gtan tshigs dang dpe
T04D3904:294b-42: dang bsgrub bya rang nyid kyi chos nyid kyis dang
T04D3904:294b-43: ldan pa dang / rjes su 'gro ba dang /
T04D3904:294b-44: ldog pa nus par 'gyur ba'i nus pa'o //
T04D3904:295a-1: rtog ge yang rang rang gi rigs pa dang ldan pas brtags par 'dod pa'o //
T04D3904:295a-2: gtan la phab pa yang grub pa'i mtha' bzhin du tshad mas bsgrub pa'i don zhe'o //
T04D3904:295a-3: de bzhin du smra ba'i mtha' grub pa dang /
T04D3904:295a-5: rnam par rtsod pa'i mtha' dang /
T04D3904:295a-6: gzhan yang gtan tshigs ltar snang ba yang ma 'dres
T04D3904:295a-7: la skyon gyi ngo bor grub par 'dod pa nyid
T04D3904:295a-8: do // tshig dor gyi mtshan nyid kyang phyir rgol
T04D3904:295a-9: ba dang rtsod pa'i dus su tshig zlos bu la
T04D3904:295a-10: sogs pa skyon du grub pa kho na'o zhes zer
T04D3904:295a-11: do // ro // lhag cog ni go nas bstan
T04D3904:295a-12: pa bzhin du skyon brjod pa nyid du grub po
T04D3904:295a-13: do // ro // zhe'o // de bzhin du tshar
T04D3904:295a-14: gcod kyang 'og nas bstan pa ltar grub par 'dod
T04D3904:295a-15: do // ro // zhe'o // pa kho na'o //
T04D3904:295a-16: de ltar tshig gi don dang tshad ma'i mtha' la
T04D3904:295a-18: 'di lta ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
T04D3904:295a-19: de ltar nye bar bkod pa'i rjes ma ming gi
T04D3904:295a-20: dbye ba tshad ma grub pa dang zhes bya ba
T04D3904:295a-21: la sogs pa bstan pa yin no ;
T04D3904:295a-22: ; de ni ji ltar ma grub pa'i gsal ba'i dbye ba shes par bya ba'i phyir /
T04D3904:295a-23: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
T04D3904:295a-24: de ltar grangs kyi dbye ba dang tshad ma ma
T04D3904:295a-25: grub pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsal ba'i
T04D3904:295a-26: dbye bas bstan pa las ma grub cing sel ba'i
T04D3904:295a-27: rigs pa ni ji lta bu zhe na /
T04D3904:295a-29: mtha' la zhen pa rnams kyi rigs pa'i gtso bo ni gtan tshigs yin la /
T04D3904:295a-30: de yang rnam pa gsum du 'dod de /
T04D3904:295a-34: de la 'bras bu ni grub pa ma yin te /
T04D3904:295a-35: phyir rgol ba'i blo la 'bras bu grub pa'i dus
T04D3904:295a-36: su bskyed pa'i rgyu 'gags la rgyun gyi tshogs kyang
T04D3904:295a-37: mi 'gag pa'i nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T04D3904:295a-38: rang bzhin yang grub pa ma yin te /
T04D3904:295a-39: dper na byas pas mi rtag pa la nges so
T04D3904:295a-40: zhes pa'i dus su byas pa ni 'khor lo dang
T04D3904:295a-41: rdza mkhan gyi lag gi 'du byed la byas pa'o
T04D3904:295a-42: zhe'am / skad cig ma snga mas phyi ma bskyed pa la bya zhe na /
T04D3904:295a-43: de la 'du byed pa ni byas pa ma yin te ;
T04D3904:295a-45: mi rtag pa ni phyis grub pa ste /
T04D3904:295a-46: mi rtag pa na dus tha dad pa'i phyir /
T04D3904:295a-47: rang bzhin gcig pa'i 'brel pa ma grub pa kho na'o //
T04D3904:295a-48: gzhan yang skad cig ma ni ma yin te /
T04D3904:295a-49: rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba'i blo grub pa'i phyir ro //
T04D3904:295b-0: gal te na sngar byas pa'i chos @295b nyid phyis kyang gtan tshigs kyi chos yin no zhe na /
T04D3904:295b-1: de lta ma yin te gang gi phyir sngar gyi byas pa'i chos phyis kyi dus su yod na /
T04D3904:295b-2: ma byas pa yang yod pas bum pa rtag par thal bar 'gyur ba kho na'o //
T04D3904:295b-3: de la mi dmigs pa yang rang bzhin dang 'bras
T04D3904:295b-4: bu ma grub pa'i phyir mi 'grub par nges so
T04D3904:295b-5: // de bas na tshad ma la sogs pa la
T04D3904:295b-6: rtog ge pa rnams ni rigs gtsor gtan tshigs 'dod
T04D3904:295b-7: // la / de ni de ltar ma grub pa nyid do //
T04D3904:295b-8: 'o na gzhan gyi 'dod pa bsal nas rang gi 'dod pa ji lta bu zhig ce na /
T04D3904:295b-9: de ni kho bo cag dbu ma chen po pa
T04D3904:295b-10: yongs su gcod pa ci yang mi byed pa gong
T04D3904:295b-11: du smras pa ma yin nam gzhan yang lung gi
T04D3904:295b-12: dgongs pa ni 'dir ma smos te /
T04D3904:295b-13: slob dpon chen pos phyi rol pa'i tshad ma dang thun mong du nye bar dgag pa'i phyir ro //
T04D3904:295b-14: 'dir rgol te gang gi tshe yongs su gcod pa
T04D3904:295b-15: med pa de'i tshe gnyen po med pa de'i phyir
T04D3904:295b-16: / spangs pa phun sum tshogs par yang mi 'gyur la /
T04D3904:295b-17: de bas na don med par 'gyur ba kho na'o //
T04D3904:295b-19: ji srid blo'i yul du byas pa de srid du kun rdzob yin la /
T04D3904:295b-20: kho bo cag kun rdzob pa ni re zhig blo'i yul du mi 'gog pa kho na'o //
T04D3904:295b-21: gzhan yang spros pa thams cad nye bar zhi ba
T04D3904:295b-22: la ni spangs pa phun sum tshogs par yang mi
T04D3904:295b-23: 'gyur ba la sogs pa de dag 'dod thog kho
T04D3904:295b-24: na yin te / gang gi phyir spros pa mtha' dag dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
T04D3904:295b-25: de bas na gzhan dag 'dod pa ltar yongs su
T04D3904:295b-26: gcod cing bsgrub pa'i don de ltar yin gyi phyi
T04D3904:295b-27: rol gyi dbu ma pa ltar gzhan gyi dbang la
T04D3904:295b-28: kun brtags kyis stong pa'i chos yongs su grub pa
T04D3904:295b-29: rtag par 'dod pa de yang dgag par nus pa
T04D3904:295b-30: ma yin pa thal bar 'gyur ro //
T04D3904:295b-31: gal te de nyid 'dod thog kho na'o zhe na /
T04D3904:295b-33: de ni slob dpon chen po klu sgrub kyis yang
T04D3904:295b-34: dag sgron ma'i bstan bcos la sogs par khyab par
T04D3904:295b-35: byed pa mi dmigs pa la sogs pa'i rigs pas
T04D3904:295b-36: bkag zin la / 'dir ni yi ge mangs kyis dogs nas ma bris so //
T04D3904:295b-37: des na slob dpon gyi dgongs pa ni gzhan gyi
T04D3904:295b-38: 'dod pa yongs su gcad pa thams cad nye bar
T04D3904:295b-39: bsal nas / mthar ltos pa'i rigs pas rang nyid
T04D3904:295b-40: kyi 'dod pa rigs kyi tshogs du ma snang ba
T04D3904:295b-41: dag kyang rnam par bcad nas yongs su gcod pa
T04D3904:296a-2: gang gi tshe yongs su gcod pa ci yang med
T04D3904:296a-3: pa de'i tshe blo dang brjod pa'i yul du mi
T04D3904:296a-4: 'gyur la / de'i phyir don dam pa zhes nye bar 'dogs so //
T04D3904:296a-5: de bas na khyod kyi skyon brjod pa don med par 'gyur ba kho na'o //
T04D3904:296a-6: da ni rnam par dgrol ba bstan pa'i phyir /
T04D3904:296a-7: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
T04D3904:296a-8: de la zhes pa ni dmigs kyis nye bar ston pa'i tha tshig go //
T04D3904:296a-9: tshad ma chos can yin la gzhal bya la ltos
T04D3904:296a-10: pa'i phyir zhes pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis grub pa yin
T04D3904:296a-11: te zhes bsgrub pa yin no //
T04D3904:296a-12: spyir khyab pa dpes mtshon pa'i phyir gang dang gang zhes pa smos so //
T04D3904:296a-13: gal te rang nyid grub pa yin na /
